::Hot Rod::

"Ok, follow me." He says, to Kamodia. Hot Rod walks out of the brush.
"Vehical mode." He transformes, to car mode.
"You want to walk yourself, or ride?" He asks, the femmbot.

::DrillBit::

DrillBit woke up, in KitKat's room. He noticed that she was gone. He
layed there for a few minutes. He was happy, and pretty close to peace.
He got up, washed up a bit, and headed to the main room. He spted
KitKat, but heard a bang on the door. He walked up to it, and yelled.
"Who is it?!"

OOC: If you would like to join my "Neo Transformers Generation One RPG",
please go to "http://www.egroups.com/group/NTGORPG".
